page.title: 18A Child's View (cont.)
page.content:
Apart from the new{youth club}the village has no entertainment for young people . Over the last few years a boys and youth section have been started at the{football}and{cricket clubs, but for most sports we have to travel to{Bath}or{Midsomer Norton .
Money for the improvement of village amenities for children and adults seems scarce.
It seems that the young people in small villages are often forgotten when it comes to providing even small facilities like{play areas , slides}or {swings}etc.
